extendedInfo.description: The DC Metro Transit edition of the MetroETA App includes DC Metro Maps, DC mass transit and public transportation statuses, schedules, and realtime ETA (estimated time of arrival) for DC Metro Bus and DC Metro Rail using real-time data retrieved from the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA) website.This app includes:â DC Metrorail Maps (Online and Offline)â DC Metrorail Realtime ETA by Stationâ DC Metrorail Realtime Alerts and Advisoriesâ DC Metrorail Linesâ DC Metrorail Stations by Lineâ DC Metrobus Maps (Online)â DC Metrobus Realtime ETA by Stopâ DC Metrobus Realtime Alerts and Advisoriesâ DC Metrobus Routes (Searchable)â DC Metrobus Timetables by Routeâ DC Metrobus Stops by Routeâ DC Metrobus Stops (Searchable)â DC Metro Transit Elevator Alerts and Advisoriesâ Functionality to create a list of favorite stations and bus stops.As seen on Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA) Application Gallery: http://developer.wmata.com/Application_GalleryThis free version of the DC Metro Transit Maps (MetroETA) App is a feature limited trial edition and may contain ads. I hope you like the free trial version of the DC MetroETA app and consider upgrading to the "pro" version.If you like MetroETA please tell your friends. Share the DC MetroETA App with your friends at MetroETA.com:http://www.MetroETA.comIf you encounter a problem or have a suggestion, please let me know. Problems will be corrected as soon as possible. Suggestions for enhancements will be reviewed and may shape future releases of the DC Metro Transit (MetroETA) App. Feedback is appreciated.  Thanks to all who have already taken time to report issues, submit suggestions and provide feedback.Thank you!Phil...â phil@leschina.netâªâªâª Made in USA âªâªâªKeywords: DC Metro Transit, Washington Metro, WMATA, DC Metro, DC WMATA, Washington Metro Area Transit Authority, Metro Transit, Metro Bus, Metro Rail, DC Metro App.

reviews.title: Off line map out of date
reviews.comment: Needs updating for stations that were rush hour only on this outdated map.
reviews.author: Carroll Gant, JR.

reviews.title: This is it
reviews.comment: This app is right on point
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Is the only such app I know of that displays bus stops on a map. Cool. But you can\'t save favorite stops and the free version is crippled. That wouldn\'t be a problem, except where is the paid app? It doesn\'t seem to exist.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works great.  After delays on train I was able to get home using buses.  Life saver!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Just what i needed to get metro bus info.  Really like the maps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: Is very user friendly.  Lets me know how long until next bus or train, which helps me make all my connectons. Definitely recommend this for daily commuter and tourists.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why
reviews.comment: Some of the \"pro\" features are free in other similar apps
reviews.author: A Google User
